author: timbeiko
content:
**ACDE Recap**
- devnet-12 going well: blobber found slashing bugs, and so did the relay testing infra. Prysm ETA to join is 1-2 weeks ðŸ’ª ! 
- Goerli shadow fork with ~300 nodes planned in the next few weeks
- Tentatively aiming to schedule the Goerli fork as soon as we're back in January
- <@363800010518822915> to continue the conversation about client support for https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/425
- Dencun now has a Meta EIP: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7569
- For Prague/Electra, the community is encouraged to start voicing their proposals on EthMagicians (https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/prague-electra-network-upgrade-meta-thread/16809) or Github for CL (https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/issues/3449). Client teams will start reviewing them as they roll in, and in Jan we'll begin sorting through it all ðŸ™‚ 
- We may set up some dedicated calls to go over Verkle & DAS, as they both are large proposals under consideration by the EL & CL side respectively for the next upgrade.
